rules.default: Keep original form; allow script-appropriate transliteration; never translate meaning
rules.ta: Prefer Tamil transliteration for cadence; retain original in parentheses on first mention
rules.te: Use Telugu script transliteration; retain original in parentheses on first mention
rules.kn: Use Kannada script transliteration; retain original in parentheses on first mention
rules.bn: Use standard Bengali phonetics; retain original in parentheses on first mention
rules.as: Use Assamese script transliteration; retain original in parentheses on first mention
rules.pnr: Retain Sanskrit/Dravidian proper nouns; no semantic translation
rules.hi: Use Devanagari transliteration; retain original in parentheses on first mention
rules.pa: Use Gurmukhi transliteration; retain original in parentheses on first mention
